order_app.api.permissions module

class order_app.api.permissions.ConsumerForPostOrAuthenticated

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow authenticated users to create orders. Consumers are allowed to create orders, while sellers and staff members are not.

has_permission(request, view)

Check if the user is authenticated and has permission to create orders.

class order_app.api.permissions.SellerForPatchOrStaffForDelete

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow sellers to update orders and staff members to delete orders.

has_permission(request, view)

Check if the user is authenticated and has permission to update or delete orders. Sellers are allowed to update orders, while staff members are allowed to delete orders.
